sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>2.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.ui.vtb" name="Visual Task Boards" state="published" version="2.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" licensable="true"> <description>Task boards with lanes - structured or ad-hoc</description> <requires> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.font_icons"/> <import plugin="com.glide.task"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.checklist"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng.amb"/> <import plugin="com.glide.rest.service"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng.filter"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.magellan_navigator_api"/> <!-- For the favorites lib (FavoriteProcessor.java) --> </requires> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="vtb" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.VTBProcessor"/> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="vtb_stream" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.VTBActivityProcessor"/> <extension point="com.glide.script.engine" name="vtb_card_history_tracker" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.history.CardHistoryTracker"/> <!-- Services --> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="VtbBoardService" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.services.BoardService"/> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="VtbLaneService" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.services.LaneService"/> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="VtbCardService" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.services.CardService"/> <!-- AMB --> <extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="BoardResponder" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.amb.BoardResponder"/> <extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="LaneResponder" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.amb.LaneResponder"/> <extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="CardResponder" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.amb.CardResponder"/> <extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="TaskResponder" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.amb.TaskResponder"/> <extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="BoardMemberResponder" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.amb.BoardMemberResponder"/> <!-- TODO: Groups on hiatus --> <!--<extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="BoardGroupResponder"--> <!--class="com.glide.ui.vtb.amb.BoardGroupResponder"/>--> <extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="ChecklistResponder" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.amb.ChecklistResponder"/> <extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="ChecklistItemResponder" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.amb.ChecklistItemResponder"/> <extension point="com.glide.record_watcher.responder" name="AttachmentResponder" class="com.glide.ui.vtb.amb.AttachmentResponder"/> </plugin>]]></definition> <description>Task boards with lanes - structured or ad-hoc</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.glide.ui.vtb</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Visual Task Boards</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.ui.vtb/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.ui.ng,com.glide.ui.font_icons,com.glide.task,com.glide.ui.checklist,com.glide.ui.ng.amb,com.glide.rest.service,com.glide.ui.ng.filter,com.glide.ui.magellan_navigator_api</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glide.ui.vtb</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type/> <version>2.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
